name: 02-Data Description and Preparation
content:
Data Description:

This dataset corresponds to XYZ Retail sales transactions data and master datasets such as Customers, Products and Distributors. The classification goal is to predict customer churn status (yes/no) for a churn_prediction. The datasets comprises of following:


  • Sales Transactions Datasets
  • Customer Information
  • Distributor Information
  • Product Information


Data Preparation:

Above mentioned datasets undergoes various transformation to compute features and target data. Followings are the some of the features computed in the process:


  • Sales done in 6 months, 3 months and 1 month for each customers
  • Number of Unique SKU bought by customers in 6 months, 3 months and 1 month
  • Target Value computation

If a customer hasn't made any sales transaction in 2 weeks then it is termed as Churned.
